comment:
#solution

select zoom, point, size
FROM (
  SELECT zoom::text as zoom,
         zoom as zoom_value,
         count(*) AS point,
         SUM(size) AS size, 
         1 as sort_order
  FROM total
  GROUP BY zoom
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Total', 
         null,
         count(*) AS point,
         SUM(size) AS size, 
         2 as sort_order
  FROM total
) t
order by sort_order, zoom_value;

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39986009/how-can-i-get-sum-total-of-each-column
